Summary: red lights, slow, low flying, but ascending to the sky
trends: There have been no other sightings in Laguna
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting Detailsat around 8:30pm Me and my wife came from dinner at Carlos pizza in tagaytay city and was going home, she was driving the car while i was staring at the sky because it was cloudy and no stars are being seen (due to the dense cloud cover). at the national highway going to sta. rosa city i noticed that there are 7 big bright red lights on the sky but there are no other stars in the sky at that time. i began to realized that what i saw are UFOs. i told my wife and ordered her to park the car at the side of the road so that we can see them clearly. i went out of the car and saw a total of 8 big red bright lights, slowly moving coming from the east, no sound, and slowly ascending and disappearing for about more than 5 minutes for each objects. i told my wife to video it using her cellphone and we just caught in video the last (8th)object slowly ascending to the sky. my reaction are: thrilled, scared but excited.
